name: LUCHO The Shooting Dog
description:
HOW TO PLAY.

Mouse Position .- Aim of the Gun.

Left Click .- Shooting in General.

Right Click .- Aiming for Shooting Projectiles.

R .- to Respawn (sometimes the colliders get stuck, I couldn't solve that issue)

ESC .- to Pause the Game.

OVERVIEW 🐶🔫

This is a Shooting Platformer, where you're a dog on a laboratory and the only way you can move and interact with the environment is by shooting with your plasma gun.

This videogame was made in a week for a video of my Youtube Channel.

I've been making an isometric bullet hell named frostbite, but after watching a lot of videos like the MVP Devlog Series of Game Maker's Toolkit videos about making a videogame about magnets, I decided to try to make a Minimum Viable Product in a Week, a small shooting Platformer to keep my game dev muscles working properly and to refresh my mindset before continuing my isometric bullet hell. 

It is a simple game, where you use your gun to move, and projectiles to solve puzzles.
